short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the new tab with a list of frequently visited sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A clean minimalist "New Tab" replacement that shows your frequently visited sites as a list. 
Updated the colors to sync with my dark color them daklee.
